summary: This mod adds 55 Summonable Followers (The DLCs DAWNGUARD and DRAGONBORN are REQUIRED)
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Summonable Followers[/size][/color][/b] [color=#00ff00][b]version 5.5[/b][/color].The DLCs Dawnguard/Dragonborn are required


[img]https://i.imgur.com/2Zepv1a.gif[/img]

With this mod you can summon [b][color=#00ff00]55[/color][/b] Followers: [color=#00ff00][b]Minotaur[/b][/color],[b][color=#00ff00] 2 Mushrooms [/color][/b] (Mr and Mrs), [b][color=#00ff00] Jellyfish[/color][/b], [color=#00ff00][b]Ash Runner[/b][/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Horseshoe Crab[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Magic Broom[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Shambles[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Shambles Lord[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Spriggan Missy[/color][/b],[b] [color=#00ff00]Spriggan Mistress[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Storm SC[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Flame Storm[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Benthic Hound[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Hound[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Wolf[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored SabreCat[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Looper[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Falmer Sentinel[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Ash Eater[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Frost Knight[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Ascended Master[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Falmer Master[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Lord[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Priest of Order[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Ash Goul[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Ash Zombie[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Benthic Shaman[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Homo Troll[/color][/b], [color=#00ff00][b]Priest Troll[/b][/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Iron Spider[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Scorpion[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Spirit SC[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Spirit Troll[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Cursed Doll[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Flesh Spirit[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Bone Strider[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Benthic Angler[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Draugr Matron[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Flame Queen[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Shoggoth Mother[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Draugr Brute[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Falmer Brute[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Ash Golem[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Boss Troll[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Mutant Troll[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Ash Hunt[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Benthic Nigri[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Draugr Giant[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Daedra Giant[/color][/b], [b][color=#00ff00]Gallimimus[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Dilophom[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Nix Hound[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Armored Hound[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color], [b][color=#00ff00]Triceratops[/color][/b][color=#ff0000]*[/color].

[color=#ff0000]*[/color] [color=#ff0000][i]You can mount these creatures ![/i][/color]


[i]To have the SUMMONABLE Followers, you must buy the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”, at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais bleu in Solitude).

With the books, you have the spells....

The creature is following you, if you do not want any more,you have another book/spell to unsummon this follower ![/i] (You can't trade with these followers)

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp Version Française pour la version 5.5[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/h9nAIwK.gif[/img]

[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]INSTALLATION[/size][/color][/b] (very important)

[color=#00ff00]Only for the manual installation:[/color]

1) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#00ff00]For the manual and the NMM installations:[/color]

2) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the books...(Normally, this is done automatically)

3) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! to obtain the books (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !).If you have not bought a book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the books, etc...

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX”,at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whitherun/Blancherive) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

4) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not


[b][color=#ff0000][size=4]Credits[/size][/color][/b]

Thanks to [color=#ff0000] GendunDrup[/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63081/?] Minotaur Resource [/url] for the Minotaur(mr_siika: made the model;dogtown1 converted it to skyrim; GendunDrup rerigged the model) ("You can use this in any of your mods as long as you credit"); and in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49682/?] Nexus Creature Resource [/url] for the meshes/textures of the Gallimimus, the Dilophom, the Triceratops ( models by [color=#ff0000]Newermind43[/color] -The Dinosaurus Era-), the Nix Hound ( model by [color=#ff0000] Dogtown1/Macadamstreet[/color] -Monster Mod-), the Armored Hound (Derivative work from the models of the games “The Witcher, The Witcher 2” from [url=http://en.cdprojektred.com/] CD Projekt Red [/url] ;“Permission was given by the Witcher makers to use these assets as long as they were properly credited.” “Lispuppy” moderator of the [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1375232-witcher-assets/] Nexus forum [/url] 03/02/2014)

Thanks to [color=#ff8c00]Vicn [/color] for the meshes of Mr Mushroom, Mrs Mushroom, Jellyfish, Ash Runner, Horseshoe Crab, Magic Broom, Shambles, Shambles Lord, Spriggan Missy, Spriggan Mistress, Bone Storm SC, Flame Storm, Benthic Hound, Bone Hound, Bone Looper, Armored Falmer Sentinel, Ash Eater, Frost Knight, Ascended Master, Armored Falmer Master, Bone Lord, Priest of Order, Ash Goul, Ash Zombie, Benthic Shaman, Homo Troll, Priest Troll, Iron Spider, Scorpion, Bone Spirit SC, Bone Spirit Troll, Cursed Doll, Flesh Spirit, Bone Strider, Benthic Angler, Armored Draugr Matron, Flame Queen, Shoggoth Mother*, Armored Draugr Brute, Armored Falmer Brute, Ash Golem, Boss Troll, Mutant Troll, Ash Hunt, Benthic Nigri, Armored Draugr Giant, Daedra Giant, in his mod [url=http://naaaaikikvicnvicn.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-36.html]Vicn Creature Resource [/url](”You can use any parts of this mod without my permission.”)

(*For the Shoggoth Mother: Enhanced Character Edit by ECE Team; Author of ObliHair150B included in "Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only" by Radioragae; DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99)

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]tumbajamba [/color] in his mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57050/?] tumbajamba's mounts [/url] for the meshes of the Armored Wolf and the Armored SabreCat (“but you may use wolf and sabrecat!”)

Thanks to [color=#ff0000]Testiger2 and XP32[/color] for the mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/45542/? ]Sabrecat Idle Animation Fix [/url] ("Permission : Free according to original tweaker/modder -testiger2-")
author: gg77

files.name: Summonable Followers 5.5 (DLCs Dawnguard - Dragonborn required)
files.changelogHtml:
New in the version 5.5: Adds Gallimimus, Dilophom, Nix Hound, Armored Hound, Triceratops

New in the version 5.0.2: Increased the size of several creatures; fixed some bugs

Version 5.0: 50 Followers, Minotaur, 2 Mushrooms,Jellyfish, Ash Runner, Horseshoe Crab,Magic Broom,Shambles,Shambles Lord,Spriggan Missy,Spriggan Mistress,Bone Storm SC,Flame Storm,Benthic Hound, Bone Hound, Armored Wolf, Armored SabreCat, Bone Looper, Armored Falmer Sentinel,Ash Eater,Frost Knight,Ascended Master,Armored Falmer Master,Bone Lord,Priest of Order,Ash Goul,Ash Zombie,Benthic Shaman,Homo Troll,Priest Troll,Iron Spider, Scorpion,Bone Spirit SC,Bone Spirit Troll,Cursed Doll,Flesh Spirit,Bone Strider,Benthic Angler, Armored Draugr Matron,Flame Queen,Shoggoth Mother,Armored Draugr Brute,Armored Falmer Brute,Ash Golem,Boss Troll,Mutant Troll,Ash Hunt,Benthic Nigri,Armored Draugr Giant,Daedra Giant.
